description.S1: You convinced Zoe to return to the Camp.
description.S2: Grace will want to hear the good news.

blurb.B1: Go back to Grace at the Botanical Lab and you can tell her the truth about Zoe joining up with Marauders,
blurb.B2: or tell her she wanted to be an outlaw.
blurb.B3: Telling her the truth does not cause any problems and rewards with 4125xp and increased positive reputation with the Deserters faction,
blurb.B4: If you Lie (5) to Grace, assuming you killed her,
blurb.B5: and say you had to put her down,
blurb.B6: you will gain some extra XP and you can show her Zoe's ring as proof she is dead.
blurb.B7: This will net you 4000 XP, Deserters Reputation and a Bolter Pistol.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I talked Zoe into coming back.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: We didn't always get along, but I'm glad to know she's safe. What happened, anyway?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: She joined up with a band of marauders. They hadn't hurt her.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Something about wanting to be an outlaw. I'd rather not get into it.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Zoe joined up with a band of marauders. Zoe. The same Zoe who doesn't know a barrel from a trigger. Well, I've heard stranger things.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: You pretty much did my job for me. Least I could do is pay you for your trouble.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: You'd better not be spinning me a story.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Let me know if I can do something for you.
